entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.7.5b
entry.content: • Fix bug with library causing invite not to be created

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.7.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Healthcheck
  • Added New Plex Invite Screen (Other servers coming soon)
  • UX & UI Improvements for Now Playing and General Styling by @designgears in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/730
  • Audiobookshelf Client Improvements by @designgears in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/729
  • BugFix/Update Discord URL by @Dario-Maselli in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/733

New Contributors

  • @Dario-Maselli made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/733

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/compare/2025.7.6...2025.7.7

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.7.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Overhaul Companion System
  • General UI Fix
  • Per Server Expiration
  • Update discord-integration.md by @SiskoUrso in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/739
  • build(deps): bump tiny-markdown-editor from 0.2.1 to 0.2.2 in /app/static by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/743
  • fix: sponsor carousel displaying over modal backdrop by @Logbog in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/746

New Contributors

  • @SiskoUrso made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/739
  • @Logbog made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/746

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/commits/2025.7.8
